text:
Adesh, You are the nicest person I met. We Don't have much long conversations but "The Bond" with you was cutest (Saying at least 'Hi' when we cross paths). Our fathers are also become very good friends. 
Bhai, milte hi rahenge.

Yaghyesh
author: Yaghyesh  Chouhan

text:
Bahut time gujara yaar sath me, First sem ki dramatics se last sem ki cheatings takğŸ˜‡.
Char saal ek bhi course dhyan se nhi kiya dono ne, last day padha h sab, maze pure liye(tune thode jyada liye).
memories likhuna to kal tak likhte hi rahunga, vese bhi i am bad writer.
Chal milte h jald hi
author: Yaghyesh  Chouhan

text:
My first thoughts- Kitna nutanki h ye, har cheez ka majak bnata, baate kitni karta h
Final thoughts- jesa bhi h bhai h apna. 
Bas noida aa rha hu, vhi phatta khelte h, teri kismat me mere hath se aur sixes likhe h, meri kismat me nhi likhe h (me bowling hi nhi karunga). 
Mil gai na job tujhe, bas rona chod de ki mene teri nuakri le li.
author: Yaghyesh  Chouhan

text:
Rahul, hero h yaar tu, filmo me ja kya engineering kar rha h. Kafi time sath gujara, first year ki Blue world trip se Kasol trip tak. 
Tu bhi koi kaam wide nhi dalte tha, aadhi pitch par ball daalta tha hath tedha karke, but spin to hoti thi teriğŸ˜….
Kitna canteen jata tha yaar, aur "chal na yaar , chal na yaar" nhi jane wale ko bhi lejata.
Tshirt kya chaapu design ki hai bhai tune. 
apna sorted h 125, 126 aur 127ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Noida me hai hi sath, vhi baat karte h aage.
author: Yaghyesh  Chouhan

text:
ek kaami hamesha rahegi, College life k last ke kuch pal agar sath gujarte to maza aata. aur trip bhi cancel kar di tune. But life me milte rahege jarur, (shadhi me bula lena)
lagbhag 3 saala to sath me gujare, haste, gaate mangal (chritraheel sali) ka majak udate.
abd ki itni fikar uski mummy ne bhi nhi ki hogi jitni tune ki. mujhe to lagta h tu engineering karne k baad UPSE nikalega (aur bihari karte byhi kya hi h). 
Ese hi haste rahiyo, har cheez ka majak bnate raheo.
author: Yaghyesh  Chouhan

text:
Abey kya kaahu, 
"One thing which is constant during whole time is YOU." (kitna chipku h tu sath hi nhi chhoda) (English thik h na?)
